"mage semath awissila -papuwe amaruwath haduna" wage dewal handiyak handiyak gane kiyamin yana boho dena ekko nisi kramayata prathikara aran na.nathnam niwaradiwa waidyawarayek wetha yomu wi prathikara aran na.kohoma wunath thamange jiwithayath ekka sellam karannata athhada balim karannata yama rogiyek hatiyata obatath,wruththiya aachara dharma walin baharawa ewan prathikara walata yomuwima aayurwedaye unnathiyama nithi prarthana karana mata waidyawariyaka hatiyatath yogya na.thamange shariraya pelana rogayak wenuwen thora gath dinayaka paya deka thunak wenkarala behethak ganna yanna mali wenna epa.eewagema paththara wala eka eka leda prathiharyayayen sanipa karanawaya kiyala danwim dana,thamange rogin me me ayayayi kiyamin wruththiya aachara dharma kelesana kisima kenek saba aayurweda waidyawarayek lesa piliganna epa.mokada apita hadena kisima asanipayak dawasen deken prathiharya walin sanipa karanna kisima waidyawarayekuta ba.

eheth metharam sithkalu maha sagaraye siduwana anapekshitha dukbara siduwim thulin ee sagaraye lassana da amathakawa yana bawa oostreliyanu agamathiniya juliya gilard mahathmiya pawasuwa ya.thamanta me shoki puwatha salawana wita di thaman wadagath samuluwakata sahabhagi wi siti bawa da mema ahinsaka saranagathayanta muhude di siduwu wipathin thaman sanwegayata pathwa owunta pilisarana wennayi adala anshawalata niyoga kala bawa da pawasa thibe.thamanta oostreliyawen me sandaha wishala sahayogayak labadena bawa da thaman da me sandaha wesesin katayuthu karana bawa da pawasu indunisiyanu janadhipathi aacharya susilo bambang yudoyo no apa derata ma ek wi mema saranagathayin beraganimu yayi da prakasha kota thibe.mema anathurata lakwuwan pilibandawa sampurna wisthara warthawak thamanta methek labi nomathi bawa da oostreliyanu agamathiniya pawasa thibe.krismas dupathe wadabalana palaka stiwan kle pawasa aththe palapurudu kandayam me wanawita sodisi meheyum sidu karana bawath thuwala karuwanata awashya prathikara waha labadimata katayuthu karana bawath ya.wisheshayen mehi athurudan wuwan pilibandawa sewimata mahath wehesak gena katayuthu karana bawath ya.mema bottuwa anathurakata bhajanaya wimata aasannama hethuwa methek heliwi nomathi athara pamana ikmawa yana pirisak ehi gaman kirima hethuwen bottuwa udu yatikuruwa perali athi bawa danata heli wi thibe.oostreliyawa ho an ratakata minis jawaramkaruwanata goduruwa giya aya atham wita nithiye rahanata kotuwuha.atham awasthawaladi minis jawaramkaruwanage basata mulawa nannandunana rataka singaman yadinnata da siduwu awastha da asannata labini.
